text:
DescriptionBaptism of Umberto Galli Zugaro.png

English:  The baptism of Umberto Galli Zugaro, son of Baron Enzo Galli Zugaro and Fabiola Massimo. First from the right: Prince Fabrizio Massimo, second from the right: King Umberto II of Italy, first woman from the left: Queen of Italy Maria Jose of Belgium.


Date

1945


Source

Own work


Author

Randomwikimaster
